name: web-automation
description: Smart web automation framework with intelligent dependency management for Selenium and Playwright

scripts.run:simple-selenium: node scripts/setup-dependencies.js auto src/examples/simple-selenium.js && node scripts/launcher.js src/examples/simple-selenium.js src/examples
scripts.run:simple-playwright: node scripts/setup-dependencies.js auto src/examples/simple-playwright.js && node scripts/launcher.js src/examples/simple-playwright.js src/examples
scripts.lambda: node scripts/setup-dependencies.js auto index.js && node index.js
scripts.docker:test:powershell: powershell -Command "$body = Get-Content 'tests/test-events/basic-test.json' -Raw; $response = Invoke-WebRequest -Uri 'http://localhost:9000/2015-03-31/functions/function/invocations' -Method POST -Body $body -ContentType 'application/json'; $response.Content | ConvertFrom-Json | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 10"
scripts.docker:status: docker-compose ps && echo '' && echo 'Recent logs:' && docker-compose logs --tail=5 web-automator-lambda
scripts.clean: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); ['output', 'downloads'].forEach(dir => { try { fs.rmSync(dir, {recursive: true}); console.log(`Cleaned ${dir}/`); } catch(e) { console.log(`${dir}/ not found`); } })"
scripts.test: npm run setup && echo 'Tests would go here'
scripts.dev: echo 'Choose: npm run selenium OR npm run playwright OR npm run lambda OR npm run docker:dev'

author: Norman Valerio
